definition: loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)

sentences.english: Mancheng County's investment policy preferences, relaxed environment.
sentences.chinese: 滿城縣的招商引資政策優惠，環境寬鬆。

sentences.english: The risk is that higher headline inflation is misinterpreted as a sign that policy is too loose.
sentences.chinese: 真正的風險是高整體通脹被誤解讀成政策寬鬆的標誌。

sentences.english: Silver and palladium face a similarly loose market.
sentences.chinese: 銀和鈀同樣面臨寬鬆的市場。

sentences.english: A loose dressing gown or negligee.
Comfy slip-on type shoes equals a happy traveler.
sentences.chinese: 寬鬆舒適的鞋子可以成就一個快樂的旅行者。

sentences.english: The coat is too tight; it must be eased under the arms.
sentences.chinese: 這件外套太緊了，須在袖子下面放寬鬆點。

sentences.english: When I was last in China, my loose-fitting, mix-and-match preppy-catalog clothing stood out.
sentences.chinese: 我最後一次在中國時，我寬鬆隨意的衣着很是顯眼。

sentences.english: And so they should, following a torrent of monetary easing.
sentences.chinese: 在一系列激進的寬鬆貨幣政策之後，這也本該如此。

sentences.english: Critics have come out on all sides of Bernanke's highly accommodative monetary policy.
sentences.chinese: 伯南克高度寬鬆的貨幣政策已然被批評地體無完膚。

sentences.english: I don't think a lady would sag.
sentences.chinese: 我想一位淑女是不會穿寬鬆褲的。

sentences.english: Apply powder liberally as often as necessary by shaking powder into your hand and smoothing onto skin.
sentences.chinese: 撲粉寬鬆視需要經常動搖粉末到你的手和平滑到皮膚。

sentences.english: Its syntax is looser than that of data formats concerned with database records.
sentences.chinese: 與數據庫記錄的數據格式相比，它的語法更加寬鬆。

sentences.english: Do not wear loose clothing or jewelery when working on moving machinery.
sentences.chinese: 不允許在運轉的設備附近穿寬鬆的衣服或戴珠寶首飾。

sentences.english: Cover the wound with a loose bandage or a piece of dry clean cloth.
sentences.chinese: 用寬鬆的繃帶或者一塊乾淨的乾布蓋住燒傷的皮膚。

sentences.english: As we found few dimmers with loose wires.
sentences.chinese: 當我們用寬鬆的電線發現少數調光器。

sentences.english: Here, a sense of uncrowned discovery still awaits.
sentences.chinese: 在此，還是期待寬鬆的環境。

definition: to correspond/answering (one another)/to agree (among the part)/corresponding/relevant/appropriate/(modify) accordingly
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
(economics) to reduce/to curtail/to cut back/to tighten/austerity/tightening/crunch
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
old-fashioned/out of date/to be later than the time stipulated or agreed upon
